<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK DCR Response Compose Locale Fields"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Add logic to include the locale-specific values in the response if they have been provided in the request"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="The values for each of the fields must be set in #OTK DCR Read Locale Fields"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="An example has been provided below for setting locale client_name"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ImNsaWVudF9uYW1lI2phLUpwYW4tSlAiOiAiJHtjbGllbnRfbmFtZV9sb2NhbGV9Ig=="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="client_name_locale"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="InBvbGljeV91cmkiOiIke3BvbGljeV91cmlfbG9jYWxlfSI="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="policy_uri_locale"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="InRvc191cmkiOiIke3Rvc191cmlfbG9jYWxlfSI="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="tos_uri_locale"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ImxvZ29fdXJpIjoiJHtsb2dvX3VyaV9sb2NhbGV9Ig=="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="logo_uri_locale"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ImNsaWVudF91cmkiOiIke2NsaWVudF91cmlfbG9jYWxlfSI="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="client_uri_locale"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
